## Plot created with Plotly on  __`r format(Date, "%B %e, %Y")`__ 



```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
data(iris)
p<-plot_ly(data = iris, x = ~Sepal.Length, y = ~Petal.Length,color = ~Species)
htmlwidgets::saveWidget(as_widget(p), file = "demo.html")

```
